The Center for Public Sector AI's Comprehensive Guide to State and Local AI Policies

The Center for Public Sector AI's "State & Local Guidance" is a centralized resource that helps government officials stay updated on AI-related policies and regulations. 

Organized by state, it compiles a wide range of AI laws, executive orders, and best practices from across the U.S., offering a comprehensive look at how different states are managing AI adoption. It includes sections on Federal Guidance, State Guidance, and Education Guidance, making it easy for officials to find relevant information. 

By presenting these guidelines in an organized format, The Center for Public Sector AI simplifies the process for state and local governments to implement AI responsibly. 

For those looking to stay informed or seeking detailed examples of AI governance in action, this resource serves as a tool for navigating the legal and regulatory landscape of AI.

Explore the full collection on the GovTech AI resource page.
